data.comment: The match has started.
Free kick for Gremio in the half of Recife PE.
In the minute 2, Bruno Cortez for Gremio drives towards goal at Ilha do Retiro. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Recife PE have been awarded a corner by Jose Mendonca da Silva Junior.
Throw-in for Recife PE in their own half.
In the minute 6, Throw-in for Gremio at Ilha do Retiro.
Corner awarded to Gremio.
Throw-in high up the field for Gremio in Recife.
In the minute 9, Gremio have been awarded a corner by Jose Mendonca da Silva Junior.
Dalberto puts the ball in the net and the home team now lead 1-0.
Gremio awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 15, Jose Mendonca da Silva Junior signals a Gremio throw-in in Recife PE's half.
Gremio's Jean Pyerre is on target but unsuccessful.
Jose Mendonca da Silva Junior signals a throw-in for Gremio, close to Recife PE's area.
In the minute 17, Jose Mendonca da Silva Junior signals a free kick to Gremio in their own half.
Recife PE's Marquinhos has been booked in Recife.
Free kick for Gremio in their own half.
In the minute 20, Gremio are coming forward and Jean Pyerre gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Recife PE have a goal kick.
Corner awarded to Gremio.
In the minute 22, Gremio to take a throw-in in Recife PE territory.
In Recife a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Free kick for Gremio in their own half.
In the minute 24, The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Jean Pyerre.
Jean Pyerre for Gremio is back on the field again.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 28, Ball goes out of play for a Recife PE goal kick.
Jose Mendonca da Silva Junior signals a free kick to Recife PE in their own half.
Can Gremio capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
In the minute 31, Jose Mendonca da Silva Junior signals a free kick to Gremio.
Jose Mendonca da Silva Junior awards Recife PE a goal kick.
Recife PE awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 33, Throw-in for Recife PE in the half of Gremio.
Thiago Neves for Recife PE gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Gremio at Ilha do Retiro.
In the minute 36, Recife PE awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick Gremio.
Walter Kannemann (Gremio) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 38, Gremio have been awarded a corner by Jose Mendonca da Silva Junior.
In Recife, Ferreira of Gremio is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Bruno Cortez is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
In the minute 40, Bruno Cortez is back on his feet again.
In Recife, Diego Churin (Gremio) misses the target with a header.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Recife.
In the minute 42, Ball safe as Recife PE is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Corner awarded to Gremio.
Can Gremio get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Recife PE's half?
In the minute 45, Corner awarded to Gremio.
At Ilha do Retiro the fourth official shows that 3 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
Gremio push forward at Ilha do Retiro and Pepe gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Recife PE defence.
In the minute 45, Gremio have been awarded a corner by Jose Mendonca da Silva Junior.
Jose Mendonca da Silva Junior signals a free kick to Recife PE in their own half.
Throw-in Gremio.
In the minute 45, Gremio to take a throw-in in Recife PE territory.
Jose Mendonca da Silva Junior awards the away team a throw-in.
The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
In the minute 46, The second-half is underway in Recife.
Gremio awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 46, Free kick for Gremio in the half of Recife PE.
Raul Prata is on a sub for Marquinhos for Recife PE.
Important block from the Recife PE defence as Ferreira fires in a strike for Gremio.
Recife PE have been awarded a corner by Jose Mendonca da Silva Junior.
In the minute 48, Goal kick for Gremio at Ilha do Retiro.
Jose Mendonca da Silva Junior awards the home team a throw-in.
Free kick for Gremio in their own half.
In the minute 50, Jose Mendonca da Silva Junior awards Recife PE a goal kick.
Free kick Recife PE.
Walter Kannemann has been booked for the second time in this match - the red card is coming out!
In the minute 54, Recife PE's Dalberto breaks free at Ilha do Retiro. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ball goes out of play for a Gremio goal kick.
Patric for the home team is judged to be offside.
In the minute 56, Can Gremio get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Recife PE's half?
In Recife Gremio attack through Ferreira. The finish is off target, however.
Recife PE have a goal kick.
In the minute 58, Recife PE's Thiago Neves gets his shot away but it misses the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Recife.
Ball safe as Recife PE is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 59, Throw-in for Gremio in the half of Recife PE.
Jose Mendonca da Silva Junior signals a Gremio throw-in in Recife PE's half.
Recife PE awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 60, Throw-in Recife PE.
Renato Gaucho is making the team's first substitution at Ilha do Retiro with Pedro Geromel replacing Lucas Silva.
In the minute 61, In Recife a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Renato Gaucho (Gremio) is making a second substitution, with Luiz Fernando replacing Ferreira.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Ronaldo for Recife PE who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Recife PE's Ronaldo is back in action after a slight knock.
In the minute 64, Gremio have a dangerous throw-in.
Throw-in for Gremio at Ilha do Retiro.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 65, Jose Mendonca da Silva Junior signals a Gremio throw-in in Recife PE's half.
Throw-in for Recife PE in the half of Gremio.
Gremio's Luiz Fernando gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 66, It's a goal kick for the home team in Recife.
The home team has substituted Ronaldo with Betinho. Jair Ventura is thus making his second change.
The away team replace Jean Pyerre with Thaciano.
In the minute 68, Can Gremio get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Recife PE's half?
Pepe (Gremio) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Marcao Silva is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
In the minute 72, Marcao Silva is back on the pitch.
Gremio have been given a penalty at Ilha do Retiro...
The match is now all square at 1-1 thanks to a penalty from Pepe.
In the minute 74, Free kick for Recife PE in their own half.
Gremio needs to be cautious. Recife PE have an attacking throw-in.
Recife PE's Lucas Mugni gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Gremio defender.
In the minute 77, It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Gremio close to the penalty box.
Jose Mendonca da Silva Junior blows against Gremio's Rodrigues for offside.
Darlan Mendes is replacing Diego Churin for Gremio at Ilha do Retiro.
In the minute 79, Throw-in for Recife PE close to the penalty box.
Recife PE drive upfield and Patric gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Gremio defender.
In the minute 80, Corner awarded to Recife PE.
Recife PE's Junior Tavares breaks free at Ilha do Retiro. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ball goes out of play for a Gremio goal kick.
Mikael (Recife PE) has replaced the possibly injured Marcao Silva at Ilha do Retiro.
In the minute 81, Throw-in for Gremio in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Jose Mendonca da Silva Junior signals a free kick to Gremio just outside Recife PE's area.
In the minute 83, Rodrigues of Gremio is pulled up for offside.
Jose Mendonca da Silva Junior signals a free kick to Recife PE.
Jose Mendonca da Silva Junior awards Gremio a goal kick.
In the minute 84, Ball safe as Gremio is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick Gremio.
Dalberto of Recife PE smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 87, Gremio have a goal kick.
Goal kick for Gremio at Ilha do Retiro.
Recife PE awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 89, Throw-in Recife PE.
Jose Mendonca da Silva Junior signals a free kick to Gremio in their own half.
The fourth official's board shows 6 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
Gremio awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Recife PE in the half of Gremio.
Gremio awarded a free kick in their own half.
Jose Mendonca da Silva Junior signals a free kick to Recife PE in their own half.
Throw-in for Gremio in their own half.
Jose Mendonca da Silva Junior signals a free kick to Gremio.
Free kick for Recife PE in their own half.
Jose Mendonca da Silva Junior awards the home team a throw-in.
It's 1-1 as the referee blows for full-time.
The home team have replaced Lucas Mugni with Ricardinho. This is the fourth substitution made today by Jair Ventura.
Thiago Neves (Recife PE) gets a yellow card.
